General.Name: China Nonferrous Metal Industry’s Foreign Engineering and Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: China Nonferrous Metal Industry's Foreign Engineering and Construction Co.,Ltd. engages in the project contracting and nonferrous metal resources exploitation activities worldwide. The company operates through Non-Ferrous Metal Mining, Dressing, and Smelting; Contract Engineering; and Equipment Manufacturing and Trading segments. It also provides execution services for nonferrous metal projects, such as engineering, consultancy, equipment supply and installation, technical service, commissioning, and personnel training. In addition, the company constructs public infrastructure projects, including housing, civil buildings, roads and bridges, and electrical power facilities, as well as nonferrous metal industry projects. Further, it exports auxiliary materials and spare parts to the overseas investment companies; imports products manufactured by the overseas resource enterprises, as well as nonferrous minerals for smelting enterprises; sells products manufactured from the overseas projects; and purchases and sells raw materials and products demanded by domestic shareholding companies. Additionally, the company trades in nonferrous metal products consisting of copper, lead, zinc, aluminum, nickel, rare earth oxides, etc. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Bin  Du
